title: Early Best Bets for Week 1 Odds, NFL Schedule Quirks, ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday (Football 5/11)
description:
The schedule is out and so are the spreads for Week 1 of the 2020 NFL season. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough offer up their best bets for that first week (8:00), diving into half the matchups on the slate. Next, the guys point out some more interesting notes with the schedule (45:30), before answering listeners questions in a 'Mailbag Monday' (53:00). Leave a 5-star review with a question attached on Apple Podcasts and the Pick Six Superfriends will answer if for you!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @JohnBreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
